body_html:
@peterjc123 I just tried that and it failed:

  1. Open admin cmd prompt
  2. cd torch\lib\build\ATen
  3. python c:\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py", line 37, in <modu
le>
    TEMPLATE_PATH + "/GeneratorDerived.h")
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\code_template.py", line 26
, in from_file
    with open(filename, 'r') as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: './templates/GeneratorDe
rived.h'

Which is strange because there most definitely is a templates dir in aten\src\ATen, and it does contain GeneratorDerived.h.

body:
@peterjc123 I just tried that and it failed:

1) Open admin cmd prompt
2) cd torch\lib\build\ATen
3) python c:\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py", line 37, in <modu
le>
    TEMPLATE_PATH + "/GeneratorDerived.h")
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\code_template.py", line 26
, in from_file
    with open(filename, 'r') as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: './templates/GeneratorDe
rived.h'
```

Which is strange because there most definitely is a templates dir in aten\src\ATen, and it does contain GeneratorDerived.h.
